query.statement: SELECT A.RNBN, A.TEXT FROM ( SELECT 1 AS RNBN,RTRIM(TEX01) AS TEXT FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT027 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND HOGIN = #HOGIN# AND MATNR = #MATNR# UNION SELECT 2 AS RNBN,RTRIM(TEX02) AS TEXT FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT027 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND HOGIN = #HOGIN# AND MATNR = #MATNR# UNION SELECT 3 AS RNBN,RTRIM(TEX03) AS TEXT FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT027 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND HOGIN = #HOGIN# AND MATNR = #MATNR# UNION SELECT 4 AS RNBN,RTRIM(TEX04) AS TEXT FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT027 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND HOGIN = #HOGIN# AND MATNR = #MATNR# UNION SELECT 5 AS RNBN,RTRIM(TEX05) AS TEXT FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT027 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND HOGIN = #HOGIN# AND MATNR = #MATNR# UNION SELECT 6 AS RNBN,RTRIM(TEX06) AS TEXT FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT027 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND HOGIN = #HOGIN# AND MATNR = #MATNR# UNION SELECT 7 AS RNBN,RTRIM(TEX07) AS TEXT FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT027 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND HOGIN = #HOGIN# AND MATNR = #MATNR# UNION SELECT 8 AS AND HOGIN = #HOGIN# AND MATNR = #MATNR# UNION SELECT 13 AS RNBN,RTRIM(TEX13) AS TEXT FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT027 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND HOGIN = #HOGIN# AND MATNR = #MATNR# UNION SELECT 14 AS RNBN,RTRIM(TEX17) AS TEXT FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT027 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND HOGIN = #HOGIN# AND MATNR = #MATNR# UNION SELECT 18 AS RNBN,RTRIM(TEX18) AS TEXT FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT027 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND HOGIN = #HOGIN# AND MATNR = #MATNR# UNION SELECT 25 AS RNBN,RTRIM(TEX25) AS TEXT FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT027 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND HOGIN = #HOGIN# AND MATNR = #MATNR# UNION SELECT 26 AS RNBN,RTRIM(TEX26) AS TEXT FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT027 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND HOGIN = #HOGIN# AND MATNR = #MATNR# UNION SELECT 27 AS RNBN,RTRIM(TEX27) AS TEXT FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT027 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND HOGIN = #HOGIN# AND MATNR = #MATNR# UNION SELECT 31 AS RNBN,RTRIM(TEX31) AS TEXT FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT027 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND HOGIN = #HOGIN# AND MATNR = #MATNR# UNION SELECT 32 AS RNBN,RTRIM(TEX32) AS TEXT FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT027 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND HOGIN = #HOGIN# AND MATNR = #MATNR# UNION SELECT 33 AS RNBN,RTRIM(TEX33) AS TEXT FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT027 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# RNBN,RTRIM(TEX35) AS TEXT FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT027 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND HOGIN = #HOGIN# AND MATNR = #MATNR# UNION SELECT 36 AS RNBN,RTRIM(TEX36) AS TEXT FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT027 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# RNBN,RTRIM(TEX38) AS TEXT FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT027 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND HOGIN = #HOGIN# AND MATNR = #MATNR# UNION SELECT 39 AS RNBN,RTRIM(TEX39) AS TEXT FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT027 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND HOGIN = #HOGIN# AND MATNR = #MATNR# UNION SELECT 40 AS RNBN,RTRIM(TEX40) AS TEXT FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT027 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND HOGIN = #HOGIN# AND MATNR = #MATNR# ) AS A WHERE A.TEXT <> '' ORDER BY A.RNBN FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
